instruction:
Given the following job description, create a tailored resume:

Job Title: AI Developer Intern - Fashion Industry

Job Description:
We are looking for an AI Developer Intern with expertise in OpenAI and DeepSeek technologies to build advanced AI applications for fashion trend forecasting, personalized recommendations, virtual try-ons, and generative AI-based designs.
Job Description
As an AI Developer Intern, you will work on AI-powered tools that improve customer experience, support creative fashion design, and optimize business operations. You will leverage OpenAI APIs (GPT, DALL·E, Whisper, etc.), DeepSeek models, and computer vision technologies to create groundbreaking AI solutions tailored for fashion brands and e-commerce platforms.
Key Areas:
1. AI-Powered Fashion Innovation
Develop AI-generated fashion design tools using OpenAI and DeepSeek models, assisting designers in pattern creation, fabric selection, and digital fashion design.
Analyze social media, runway trends, and market data to develop AI-driven fashion trend prediction models.
2. Personalization & E-commerce Optimization
Build AI fashion styling assistants and recommendation systems for personalized outfit suggestions.
Develop visual search and AI-powered recommendation engines to enhance e-commerce shopping experiences.
Implement NLP-based AI chatbots for automated customer support and fashion advice.
3. AI Model Deployment & Optimization
Deploy AI models on AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure for scalability and real-time performance.
Optimize machine learning models for fast and efficient AI-driven recommendations.
Implement MLOps best practices to monitor and continuously improve AI performance.
Qualifications & Skills
Required:
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.
Strong proficiency in Python and experience with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc.).
Knowledge with OpenAI APIs (GPT-4, DALL·E, Whisper, etc.) and DeepSeek models.
Experience in natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, or generative AI applications.
Experience with cloud-based AI deployment (AWS, GCP, Azure).
Fluency in Mandarin speaking and writing is preferred.
Preferred:
Experience with generative AI for digital fashion and 3D modeling.
Familiarity with fashion datasets, garment classification algorithms, and AI-driven material recognition.
Knowledge of AR/VR applications for virtual fitting rooms and AI-powered fashion experiences.
Familiarity with fashion tech applications such as AI-driven virtual try-ons, fashion recommendation systems, and generative fashion design tools.
Why Join Us?
Be at the forefront of AI-driven fashion innovation
Learning and career growth opportunities
Work with top fashion brands and tech leaders in a global industry
Flexible work environment (remote/hybrid)
Opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI tools and large-scale fashion datasets
We look forward to working with you to transform the fashion industry with AI!

Please create a tailored resume that highlights relevant skills and experience for this position.
output:
Here is a tailored resume for the AI Developer Intern - Fashion Industry position:

SATHVIK ADDICHARLA
Denton, TX 76207 | sathvikaddicharla@my.unt.edu | +1 (940) 597-5745 | [LinkedIn] | [GitHub]
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
AI/ML graduate student with hands-on experience in generative AI, NLP, and multimodal applications. Proficient in building and deploying AI systems using OpenAI APIs, Whisper, Hugging Face Transformers, and vector search for real-time personalization and content generation. Experienced in model deployment using AWS, Flask, and Docker. Passionate about applying creative AI solutions in digital experiences like fashion trend forecasting, virtual styling, and recommendation systems.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Generative AI & LLMs: OpenAI GPT-4, DALL·E (conceptual), Whisper, LangChain, Hugging Face
NLP & CV: Transformers, SpaCy, OpenCV, Vision Transformers (ViT), Image Augmentation
Recommendation & Personalization: FAISS, KNN, cosine similarity, embedding clustering
Languages: Python, C++, SQL
Cloud & MLOps: AWS (S3, Lambda), Docker, MLflow, FastAPI, GCP (Vertex AI – familiar)
Other: REST APIs, JSON parsing, Streamlit UI demos, Mandarin (basic comprehension – optional mention if applicable)
EDUCATION
Master’s in Data Science
University of North Texas | 04/2024 – 08/2026 | GPA: 3.66/4.0
Bachelor’s in Computer Science – Data Science
VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Technology, India | GPA: 8.60/10
EXPERIENCE
AI/ML Engineer Intern
Cantellate Software Pvt Ltd | Hyderabad, India | 03/2023 – 09/2023
Built RAG-based assistant using Hugging Face Transformers, OpenAI Whisper, and FAISS for conversational retrieval tasks.
Developed and deployed personalized ML pipelines for content recommendations, improving engagement relevance by 75%.
Integrated OpenAI APIs into product-facing NLP apps; tuned prompts for guided Q&A experiences.
Deployed AI services using Flask + Docker on AWS infrastructure with MLflow for performance tracking.
Worked in agile cycles with design/engineering to iterate real-time ML solutions for creative problem spaces.
PROJECTS
LLM Chatbot for Medical Style Recommendations (IEEE)
Built LangChain-powered diagnostic advisor integrating knowledge retrieval and GPT-style model outputs.
Designed conversation flows resembling e-commerce style quizzes for conditional product guidance.
AI YouTube Summarizer (Whisper + FAISS)
Used OpenAI Whisper for transcription, encoded with Transformers, and deployed semantic search through FAISS.
Designed as a personalized content recapper, usable for fashion influencers or media brands.
Emotion Detection in Speech Using LSTM
Applied MFCC preprocessing and attention-based LSTM modeling for emotional tone detection in voice data.
Could be extended for analyzing voice-tone in customer service chatbots or styling assistants.
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING
Training LLMs with Your Own Data – DeepLearning.ai
Python for Data Science – Udemy
Deep Learning – NPTEL (IIT Ropar)
Google Data Analytics – Coursera
PUBLICATIONS
Generative Retrieval-Augmented LLM Chatbot for Health – IEEE (09/2024)
Transfer Learning for Autism Detection – IEEE (08/2024)
